subtitle: Honesty
title: Why Root On?
description: What seems impossible to others has been made possible by Root On. We have a successful approval rate of more than 70%, considering the fact that a large portion of our clients have complex profiles like - an education gap of more than 5-10 years, multiple previous refusals, poor academic backgrounds, inability to get admission from above average institutions, etc. Want to know how?

cards.title: Exclusively for Canada
cards.description: Specialized in Canadian immigration, we navigate the specific complexities of the Canadian system with ease.

cards.title: More than 14 Years of Expertise
cards.description: Leveraging over 14 years of experience, we offer unparalleled expertise in Canadian immigration.
